DOC.brief_summary: This single-centre observational , prospective study carry maternity unit Dijon CHU . It include pregnant woman pre-conception BMI ≥ 30 kg/m² evaluate patient , activation migration capacity circulate leukocyte association onset spontaneous labour . Patients meet inclusion criterion inform study consultation 7th 8th month , gynecologist invite take part . If answer positive , patient see specific consultation study 37th 38the Weeks amenorrhea maternity unit Dijon CHU . During consultation , gynecologist conduct medical examination , Plurithematic clinical investigation center nurse take blood sample ( 3 x 6ml tube 1 x 7ml tube ) . If labour start 41 Weeks amenorrhea , patient see another consultation ( consultation program usual follow-up pregnancy ) second blood sample ( 1 x 6ml tube 1 x 7ml ) take . The patient follow childbirth split two group accord whether give birth onset spontaneous labour .
DOC.criteria: Patient give write consent Please affiliate social security scheme Body Mass Index Preconception ≥ 30 kg / m² Age > 18 year Unique Pregnancy Having plot Normal Fetal heart rate Pathology change mode delivery induction labor ( preeclampsia , chronic hypertension gestational , diabetes unbalanced diet , ... ) Scheduled Caesarean Infectious Disease suspect proven , include HIV infection , hepatitis C , hepatitis B Pathology inflammatory autoimmune Antiinflammatory immunosuppressive therapy Patient guardianship Patient safeguard justice • SECONDARY EXCLUSION CRITERIA : Caesarean section labor Delivery 37 Weeks amenorrhea Antiinflammatory immunosuppressive therapy study participation Fetal Heart Rate abnormal study participation Premature rupture fetal membrane without formal labor spontaneously within 48 hour
